nodes.text: "A Trooper's Worth" (German title "Der Wert eines Kriegers") is a comic strip written by Alec Worley, drawn by Cosmo White and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 1st issue of the German Star Wars Rebels Animation-Magazine, which was released on February 14, 2018. It was first published in English in the September 2019 issue of the Australian magazine K-Zone.
